headline.print_headline: Japan Current Account Deficit Widens to Record, Q4 Growth Slows
headline.main: Japan Current Account Deficit Widens to Record, Q4 Growth Slows

lead_paragraph: Japan posted a record current account deficit in January and fourth quarter growth was revised down, heightening fears of a deepening economic slowdown amid soft exports and an expected chill in demand from an increase in the sales tax.
